Balistica dropped her speed so as not to make any false move. This was
still a grenade, and very lethal at that. But as she was about to
trigger it, a huge metal thing sprang out of the wall and knocked her
out. She dropped the grenade and her propulsor were beginning to fail...

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Airly" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> OOC: Right now?
> 
> Windlord watched the Exit and said "Be ready... free the granade
when I said 'Now'. "
> 
> the male was closed, closest...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Nic 
>   To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
>   Sent: Friday, August 12, 2005 8:27 AM
>   Subject: Re: Labs in IRon Skull Predacons's base
> 
> 
>   OOC: Whenever you want! ;)
> 
>   Balistica grabbed the grenade and clenched it in her hand very
>   tightly. She flew at avertiginous speed, knowing they were hunted for
>   a long time. Whatever. It was better than anything those bastards had
>   prepared for them.
> 
>   Far under, though, the door was blasted away by the final blow of the
>   demolition tools. The security squad entered the lab, and, seeing the
>   vent duct ripped open, triggered the ventilation security devices.
>   Those two wouldn't get out alive.
